transcript:
Customer: Hello. 
Executive: Hanji sir.
Customer: Hello. 
Executive: Hello. Han sir wo call I think disconnect ho gaya tha. Sarfaraj ji se baat ho rahi hai na ETS construction se.
Customer: Hanji hanji ji bataiye sir.
Executive: Han sir Vivek baat kar raha hun business manager from IndiaMART.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Han sir aap ka jo refund ko lekar usi ke regarding call kiya hai maine aapko.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Refund sir humne initiate kar diya hai.
Customer: Kab tak ho jayega sir?
Executive: Ek second sir aapka jo amount hai sir ye hai 31553 rupees.
Customer: Matlab tax amount deduct hua hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi nahi tax nahi aapka wo jitne din service aapka chala tha.
Executive: Sirf wo amount deduct hua hai aapka.
Customer: But sir service ka mujhe koi benefit to hua hi nahi hai na.
Executive: Sir main ek cheez bataun Sarfaraj ji ideally dekhiye maine aapse ye cheez bhi bola tha sir ki aapke paas kuch hai return communication ya kuch bhi aisa kyunki aapne bola tha ki mujhe bola gaya tha ki aap jab bhi chaho aap refund le sakte ho.
Customer: To aapne uske liye mana kar diya tha ki nahi mere paas abhi kuch aisa hai nahi.
Executive: To generally sir agar aisa kyunki hum hamara ye policy hai nahi sir ki hum refund is tarike se initiate kare ya is tarike se kare but aap us cheez ko lekar pareshan the kafi isliye maine is cheez ko kahin na kahin aage baat ki maine aur maine bola ki isko initiate karte hain kisi bhi hal mein.
Customer: But sir but sir is deduction kyun ho raha hai agar dekho mere paas ek bhi aapka koi bhi wo aaya ho to main is cheez ko accept kar loon.
Executive: Sir dekhiye do cheeze hoti hai do cheeze hoti hai sir dekhiye IndiaMART ka jo business model hai wo is tarike se kaam karta hai ki hum hum koi commission based model pe kaam nahi karte aap IndiaMART se zero rupay kamaiye chahe ek crore rupay kamaiye log hain sir log hain jo karodon mein kama rahe hain aur bahut achcha kar rahe hain IndiaMART unse ek rupay bhi commission nahi leta kisi bhi deal pe to hamara jo platform hai sir wo ab theek hai aapko galat tarike se ho sakta hai sir ki unhone is tarike se communicate kiya ho aapko warna hamare yahan refund policy bhi nahi hai sir aur na hum koi 100% business ki guarantee dete hain aapka jo market scenario hoga ha lekin agar aap hamare dekhenge overall result to hamare paas buyers hain sir achche khase buyers hain hamare paas hamare paas daily traffic hai hamare paas aur hamare paas agar koi ek saal karta hai to milta hai sir usko business majority of the suppliers ko milta hai business lekin wo business kab milega kitne time period mein milega ye hum kabhi guarantee nahi karte hain sir.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Hamare paas itne sare repeat sellers hain jo har saal hamari services ko renew karte hain aur wo chala rahe hain kafi time se services to unko sir business mil raha hai unko opportunities dikh rahi hai tabhi to kara rahe hain wo.
Customer: Nahi sir bilkul kara rahe honge but sir wo kya hai product supplier hai mera service hai kahin na kahin gap ho raha hai sir.
Executive: Wale bhi hain sir aisa nahi hai ki service wale hai hi nahi hamare paas bilkul bhi.
Customer: Aur dusra sir dusra sir mere ko dekho ye aapka ye lene se koi benefit to hua nahi hai mere paas koi bhi service aayi nahi hai dekho aap deduction ka right banta hai main bol to main khud hi bol deta aapko aap pura pura deduction kar sakte the but mere paas ek bhi koi bhi kisi tarah ka order aaya hota to.
Executive: Sir order aaya hota to fir aap refund ke liye thodi jaate aap to fir continue karte services ko.
Customer: Bilkul main bhi wahi keh raha hun agar by chance aisa kuch hota bhi ki main aapko refund ke liye bolta bhi to aap logon ka ye right banta hai ki aap log jo hai refund usi hisab se cutting karke dal sakte the agar aisa koi chances aata hai to.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: But aisa koi chances hi nahi hai sir.
Executive: Wahi main keh raha hun sir dekhiye ideally maine aapko bataya ki hamare yahan koi is tarike se policy hi nahi hai lekin aapne apna scenario bataya aapne bataya ki ha ye ye cheeze hui thi aur humne usko internally verify kiya hai na ab unhone to bol diya sir ki humne aisa kuch nahi commit kiya hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Kaun sahi hai sir kaun galat hai kaise pata lagega aapne agar yahi agar aap bolte ki ha ye kyunki ye to bahut bada statement ho gaya sir ki aapko refund ke liye bola gaya hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Bada statement ho gaya agar aisa hai aap kyunki agar mujhe bhi main bhi koi service le raha hun sir aur mujhe koi keh raha hai ki aapko refund mil jayega ya aapko 100% guaranteed business mil jayega is tarike se agar sir koi bhi commit kar raha hai to wo to us pe return form mein sir main lunga na us pe ye main sirf yahan ke liye nahi main aage ke liye bhi bata raha hun sir.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Koi bhi cheez jo hai wo aapke paas hona chahiye sir isliye aapke paas ek proposal bheja jata hai jisko aap khud approve karte hain.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Jab aap services ko lete hain to.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: To to overall aap dekhenge to lagbhag kitna mere khayal se 1500 ke aas pass deduct hua hai sir aapka.
Customer: 1500 kyun hua hai sir?
Executive: Kitna kitna amount refund bata rahe ho abhi aap?
Executive: 533 rupees sir.
Customer: 500
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to know the reason for deduction.

- Did not receive any benefit from the service.



Resolution:

- Refund has been initiated.

- Explained the business model and refund policy.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, deduction, business, policy
